    Buy Season Pass Buy Tickets fill-width end header-wrapper-wrapper
    Group Outings Your Park... Your Event! Bring a group for the best value on admission and food. Whether it's a bunch of your close friends, family, or an entire corporation, Sun Splash Family Waterpark can accommodate groups from 30 to 3,000. Let us handle all of the details to make your event full of summer fun!

    SPECIAL OFFER - Save Up to 50%

    half-first Picnics Fundraisers Church Events School Events Family Events half-first Company Outings Corporate Team-Building Employee Discount Program Youth Events - Scout Days & Sports Associations half-first half-second Sun Splash offers a VARIETY of event options for groups of ALL Sizes
    • Delicious Food and Beverage Items
    • Themed Games and Team Building
    • All Day Park Admission
    • Reserverd Pavillion
    • One Per 10 FREE Chaperone Tickets
    • Exclusive Buy-Out Packages Available


    Big Group? Everything’s bigger in Cape Coral, even discounts! Get waterpark admission for up to 50% off. Limited time offer. Admission for Groups of 50 or more, must book in advance. BOOK NOW!

    Just need tickets? Check out our

    Group Bulk Ticket packages here!

    Contact us ASAP to hold your space for fun, no deposit required at time of booking!


    BACK TO TOP


    Companies & Associations

    When it comes to group bonding, a thrilling waterpark slide is guaranteed to make it memorable. Bring your whole staff to the park. It's a great way to reward their hard work, celebrate company achievements and motivate your entire team. In addition to a day at the park together, Sun Splash Family Waterpark also offers discount ticket programs that you can offer as an employee benefit at no cost to your company. We'll also set your group up with special pricing, meal vouchers and other perks.

     

    Schools

    Visit us on our educational days when we turn the park into a learning lab or just give your kids a pass to have fun. Sun Splash Family Waterpark also offers special fundraising opportunities to schools.

     

    Religious Organizations

    We'll work with you to create the perfect program of events and activities. From baptisms to concerts, we can organize your day around your requests.

     

    Reunions

    Rekindle fond memories and create new ones. Whether you're bringing together 30 or 200, we have room for all your nearest and dearest. Plus we'll cater the affair from set-up to clean-up.

     

    Travel Groups

    Bring your whole tour group to Sun Splash Family Waterpark for a full day of fun. We make it easy by offering special pricing, catering packages, parking for buses and even admission for bus drivers.

     

    Youth Groups

    Nothing makes a kid's day like a visit to Sun Splash Family Waterpark. Let us usher your crew through the park's entrance with pre-paid tickets, arrange a private picnic area and ensure everyone has an unforgettable day of fun.

     

    BACK TO TOP Fill out our contact form below ASAP to hold your space for fun, no deposit required at time of booking! Private Event Software powered by Tripleseat Have questions or want more information?     2025 Special Events

    Check back here for our exciting 2024 Special Event Line-up

    Spring Break Celebration
    Saturday March 15th & 22nd

    Join us as we celebrate Spring Break with a DJ dance and fun foam party.

     
    event

    St. Paddy’s Celebration
    Sunday March 16th & Monday March 17th

    We are going green! Help us celebrate St. Paddy’s Day as we turn our pools green and kick off the day with the Lucky #7 Cocktail. Then dance an Irish Jig at our Dance and Green foam party.

     
    event

    Sunset @ Sunsplash
    Saturday March 29th » 6:30 PM – 9:30 PM

    Our popular after-hours event is back. Enjoy Sunsplash in the evening with this exclusive party featuring DJ dance and glow foam parties. The package includes admission and food. Each event will offer a specialty cocktail for purchase. Additional fee required and Season Passes are not accepted for this after-hours event.

    To purchase your ticket or Season Pass event ticket Click Here

     
    event

    Sunset @ Sunsplash
    Saturday April 12th » 6:30 PM – 9:30 PM

    Our popular after-hours event is back. Enjoy Sunsplash in the evening with this exclusive party featuring DJ dance and glow foam parties. The package includes admission and food. Each event will offer a specialty cocktail for purchase. Additional fee required and Season Passes are not accepted for this after-hours event.

    To purchase your ticket or Season Pass event ticket Click Here

     
    event

    Easter Eggtravaganza
    Saturday April 19th

    Join us for our unique take on an easter egg hunt (ages 5 – 12). There will be a special prize in exchange for eggs. Also come say hello to the Easter Bunny.

     
    event

    Cinco De Mayo Celebration
    Saturday May 3rd – Sunday May 4th

    Enjoy this fun celebration with fun themed music, specialty margaritas and Cinco De Mayo themed limited time only Pulled Pork Street Tacos.

     
    event

    Mother’s Day Weekend
    Saturday May 10th – Sunday May 11th

    We will honor Mom all weekend long with FREE Mom’s Admission Tickets and a specially priced Mimosas.

     
    event

    Sunset @ Sunsplash
    Saturday May 17th » 6:30 PM – 9:30 PM

    Our popular after-hours event is back. Enjoy Sunsplash in the evening with this exclusive party featuring DJ dance and glow foam parties. The package includes admission and food. Each event will offer a specialty cocktail for purchase. Additional fee required and Season Passes are not accepted for this after-hours event.

    To purchase your ticket or Season Pass event ticket Click Here

     
    event

    Memorial Day Weekend
    Saturday May 24th – Monday May 26th

    We will honor all active and retired Military with FREE admission, and we will kick off Summer with some DJ dance fun.

     
    event

    Sunset @ Sunsplash
    Saturday May 31st » 6:30 PM – 9:30 PM

    Our popular after-hours event is back. Enjoy Sunsplash in the evening with this exclusive party featuring DJ dance and glow foam parties. The package includes admission and food. Each event will offer a specialty cocktail for purchase. Additional fee required and Season Passes are not accepted for this after-hours event.

    To purchase your ticket or Season Pass event ticket Click Here

     
    event

    Father’s Day Weekend
    Saturday June 14th – June 15th

    We will honor Dad all weekend with FREE Dad’s admission tickets and special deals on craft beer.

     
    event

    Prince & Princess Day
    Saturday June 21st

    Bring your prince and princesses to meet our prince and princesses. Get your photo with them and enjoy a royally fun DJ dance party. Stick around for an interactive princess story time at 2pm.

     
    event

    World’s Largest Swim Lesson
    Thursday June 26th 9:00 AM – 10:00 AM

    Join us before the park opens in participating in the World’s Largest Swimming Lesson. We will be teaching basic water safety skills to keep everyone safe. All preregistered for the event will receive a FREE 2025 Sunsplash daily admission ticket.


    REGISTER NOW!
     
    event

    Independence Weekend Celebration
    Friday July 4th – Sunday July 6th

    We will honor our nation’s military with FREE admission all weekend long. Enjoy patriotic foam parties, $2 All-American hot dogs, Bomb Pop Cocktails and discounts on domestic draft beer.

     
    event

    Champion’s Day Summer Celebration
    Saturday July 12th - 9:00 AM – 10:00 AM

    We are proud to partner with Special Olympics to honor these amazing Champions with an exclusive morning designed for families and individuals with special needs. Champions and their families will have exclusive access to the park in the morning. Champions will get free all- day admission, and families may purchase up to four tickets for the day for only $10.

     
    event

    Superhero Day
    Saturday July 19th

    Bring your little superheroes to meet our superheroes throughout the day. Get your photo and enjoy a heroic day with face painting starting at 2pm.

     

    Sharkey Day
    Saturday July 26th

    Celebrate Shark Week with our very own Shark celebrity. Come meet our favorite shark in all the seven seas as he hangs out with his pirate pals. Rock the waves with the Paridise Cove Wave Pool party and enjoy a feeding frenzy with themed jalapeno poppers that bite back, a Sharkey slush for the little buccaneers or a limited time only Shark Attack Cocktail for the captains of the ship.

     

    National Waterpark Day
    Monday July 28th

    Help us celebrate our favorite day of the year. We will cool things off with a 1-ton ice dump into our Paradise Cove Wave Pool. Enjoy a DJ dance party. Half price admission tickets and ice cream novelties from Sharkeys.

     

    Back To School Supply Drive
    July 28th – August 10th

    Every kid deserves the best school supplies to kick off the year. Help us make that happen and get a GREAT deal on a Sunsplash daily admission ticket. When you donate 5 NEW school supply items from the list below, you will get a $10 daily admission ticket valid thru the month of August. Approved items:


    • Box of pencils
    • Box of pens
    • Notebook paper (wide-ruled – 100 count)
    • Bottles of Glue
    • Index cards
    • 3-Ring Binders
    • Markers (10 Count)
    • 24 Count Crayons
    • Folders (10 Count)
    • Backpacks
     
     
    Dive In Movies August 9th – October 25th Movies are FREE with park admission.
  • Saturday August 9th – Moana II – 6pm
    • Saturday August 30th – Sonic the Hedgehog III – 4pm Saturday September 13th – Mufasa – 4pm Saturday September 27th – Paw Patrol – The Mighty Movie – 4pm Saturday October 11th – Aladdin – 4pm Saturday October 25th – Nightmare Before Christmas – 4pm Saturday November 1st – Kung Fu Panda IV – 2pm

    Parrot Head Senior's Night
    Saturday August 16th » 6:30 – 9:30

    Float the waves and river while chilling on your favorite Jimmy Buffet Tunes. Enjoy Special prices on Cheeseburgers and Pineapple Margarita. Additional fee required and Season Passes are not accepted for this after-hours event.

    To purchase your ticket or Season Pass event ticket Click Here

     
    event Season Pass Appreciation Month September - All Month Long Join us all month long as we celebrate YOU, our valued Season Pass Holders. Bring a Friend or only $10 all month long and enjoy special offers on select food and beverage items. Valid for any 2025 or 2026 season pass holder. event Sunset @ Sunsplash Saturday September 6th » 6:30 PM – 9:30 PM Our popular after-hours event is back. Enjoy Sunsplash in the evening with this exclusive party featuring DJ dance and glow foam parties. The package includes admission and food. Each event will offer a specialty cocktail for purchase. Additional fee required and Season Passes are not accepted for this after-hours event. To purchase your ticket or Season Pass event ticket Click Here event Paradise Cove Gameday Football Party Select Saturdays and Sundays During Football Season Grab your favorite College or NFL gear and cheer on your favorite team relaxing in the all- new Paradise Cove Wave Pool and enjoy all the action on our large jumbotron. Plus enjoy great deals on classic tailgate food and domestic drafts! event Sunset @ Sunsplash Saturday September 20th » 6:30 PM – 9:30 PM Our popular after-hours event is back. Enjoy Sunsplash in the evening with this exclusive party featuring DJ dance and glow foam parties. The package includes admission and food. Each event will offer a specialty cocktail for purchase. Additional fee required and Season Passes are not accepted for this after-hours event. To purchase your ticket or Season Pass event ticket Click Here event Spooky Splash Bash Saturday October 25th Kick off this frightfully fun season with our second annual Spooky Splash Bash. Come in costume and trick or treat in the park at select locations! Fun music, costume contests, games and Halloween themed activities will complement the perfect way to get ready for the spooky season! event Share What You Can Food Drive Any November Operating Day Our 3rd annual Share What You Can Food Drive takes place any November operating day. Bring 5 non-perishable food items and receive a daily admission ticket for just $10. All donations will support Cape Coral Caring Center. event End of Season Christmas Celebration Sunday November 30th Help us celebrate the end of the season and kick-off the Holiday season with Holiday themed Ohana Games, meet & greets and story time with Santa and our very own Holiday Hero, Santa Sharkey. event fill-width content-wrapper-wrapper BACK TO TOP Facebook Instagram Twitter Youtube 500 W Lake Kennedy Dr., Cape Coral, FL 33991 | (239) 574-0558 footer-address-wrapper
